powers.title: Gift Health
powers.description: Drains 3 points of your health, giving 2 health points it to another person/creature.

powers.title: Gift Energy
powers.description: Drains 3 points of your energy, giving 2 points of energy to another person/creature.

powers.title: Leather Armor
powers.description: Basic armor. Increases you max HP by 3 points.

powers.title: Ninja Armor
powers.description: Suit made out of light black clothes. Increases you max HP by 3 points. Makes you very hard to notice in the dark.

powers.title: Steel Armor
powers.description: Increases your max HP by 6 points.

powers.title: Obsidian Armor
powers.description: Increases your max HP by 8 points.

powers.title: Wizard's Robes
powers.description: Increases your max Energy by 4 points

powers.title: Kinestetic
powers.description: You know the basics of "Kinestetic" Magic School. Allows you to cast spells that modify your physical abilities.

powers.title: Kinestetic
powers.description: You are good the "Kinestetic" Magic School. You can cast more powerful spells.

powers.title: Kinestetic
powers.description: You are the expert in Kinestetics. You can cast advanced spells.

powers.title: Battle Magic
powers.description: You know the basics of Battle Magic. Allows you to cast offensive spells.

powers.title: Battle Magic
powers.description: You are good at Battle Magic. You can cast more powerful spells.

powers.title: Battle Magic
powers.description: You are the expert of Battle Magic. You can cast advanced spells.
